descriptionHtml:
http://youtu.be/vn01wJz3rPE

1st mod I made \"Poseidon\" he has all master ice spells including Ice Storm, blizzard, frost thrall, Frost Breath Shout and he actually uses them that\'s awesome right? he has perks Destruction master 100 and twin souls. 

He should be located at the Inn at Riverwood.


FILE HAS BEEN ADDED
